you can check the gun stats in-game

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit or later
  • Processor: 3.0+ GHz Quad core
  • Memory: 4000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: gtx 750 ti or better
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit or later
  • Processor: 3.0+ GHz Quad core
  • Memory: 8000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: gtx 970 or better
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
